datasets.dataset_description: The DarkReddit+ dataset contains same-author and different-author pairs of text taken from Reddit comments from the defunct subreddit /r/darknetmarkets.
datasets.short_description: The DarkReddit+ dataset, an authorship verification dataset with text pairs taken from Reddit commments.
datasets.dataset_info:
Input, Output and Metrics:

The task is to classify a pair of texts into the given two classes (same author and different authors). The target is to maximize the overall score on the test set.

The overall score an average over the AUC, F1 score, F0.5 score and c@1 score.

Download from:

https://zenodo.org/record/6998375

Citation:

If you use this dataset in a published work, please cite the following:

Andrei Manolache, Florin Brad, Antonio Barbalau, Radu Tudor Ionescu, Marius Popescu. "VeriDark: A Large-Scale Benchmark for Authorship Verification on the Dark Web". arXiv 2022. Read the full paper

or in .bibtex format:

@misc{VeriDarkArxiv,
doi = {10.48550/ARXIV.2207.03477},
url = {https://arxiv.org/abs/2207.03477},
author = {Manolache, Andrei and Brad, Florin and Barbalau, Antonio and Ionescu, Radu Tudor and Popescu, Marius},
keywords = {Computation and Language (cs.CL), FOS: Computer and information sciences, FOS: Computer and information sciences},
title = {VeriDark: A Large-Scale Benchmark for Authorship Verification on the Dark Web},
publisher = {arXiv},
year = {2022},
copyright = {Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International}
}

datasets.dataset_description: The DarkReddit+ author identification contains comments written by one of ten possible users from the /r/darknetmarkets subreddit. The task is to predict the correct user, given a comment.
datasets.short_description: The DarkReddit+ author identification dataset is a 10-way classification problem with texts from the subreddit /r/darknetmarkets.
datasets.dataset_info:
Input, Output and Metrics:

The task is to predict the true author of a given text. There are 10 possible authors. The target is to maximize the accuracy test set.

Download from:

https://zenodo.org/record/6998363

Citation:

If you use this dataset in a published work, please cite the following:

Andrei Manolache, Florin Brad, Antonio Barbalau, Radu Tudor Ionescu, Marius Popescu. "VeriDark: A Large-Scale Benchmark for Authorship Verification on the Dark Web". arXiv 2022. Read the full paper
